revised_title: On the Decomposition of Oil Gas and the Discovery of a New Compound of Carbon and Hydrogen
tldr: The author investigates the decomposition of oil gas and discovers a new compound of carbon and hydrogen, which he calls bi-carburet of hydrogen. The compound is obtained through a series of distillation and purification processes and has unique properties, such as a specific gravity of 0.85 and a fusing point of nearly 42°F.
